resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81364</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81364</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4983</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Inside the SPHE Classroom</string>
            <string language="es">Dentro de la clase SPHE</string>
            <string language="ga">Laistigh de sheomra ranga an OSPS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Innerhalb des SPHE Klassenzimmers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">À l'intérieur de la salle de classe de SPHE</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dentro da sala de aula de SPHE</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">All'interno dell'aula di SPHE</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέσα στην τάξη SPHE</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Outlines the desired relationship with students in the SPHE classroom, group leadership skills for teachers, setting ground rules and forming students into groups.</string>
            <string language="es">Describe la relación deseada con los estudiantes en la clase SPHE, las habilidades de liderazgo de grupos de los profesores, el establecimiento de normas básicas y la formación de grupos de estudiantes.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tugann sé imlíniú ar an gcaidreamh ata ag teastáil sa seomra ranga OSPS, scileanna ceannaireachta grúpa do mhúinteoirí, bunrialacha a leagan síos agus daltaí a chur i ngrúpaí.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SPHE</string>
            <string language="es">SPHE. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">OSPS</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umreißt das gewünschte Verhältnis zu den 
Kursteilnehmern im SPHE Klassenzimmer, die Gruppe Führungfähigkeiten
für Lehrer, stellt Grundrichtlinien ein und bildet Kursteilnehmer in 
Gruppen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trace les grandes lignes du rapport désiré avec 
les étudiants dans la salle de classe de SPHE, qualifications de 
conduite de groupe pour des professeurs, plaçant les règles de base 
et façonnant des étudiants en des groupes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esboça o relacionamento desejado com os estudantes
na sala de aula de SPHE, habilidades da liderança do grupo para 
professores, ajustando as réguas à terra e dando forma a estudantes 
em grupos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrive il rapporto voluto con gli allievi 
nell'aula di SPHE, abilità di direzione del gruppo per gli 
insegnanti, regolanti i principi di base e formanti gli allievi nei 
gruppi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιγράφει την επιθυμητή σχέση με τους σπουδαστές στην
τάξη SPHE, τις δεξιότητες ηγεσίας ομάδας για τους δασκάλους, 
τους θέτοντας βασικούς κανόνες και τη διαμόρφωση των σπουδαστών 
στις ομάδες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
